name: rubberduck

0.0.9.name: rubberduck
0.0.9.description: Punch JavaScript objects and receive events before and after a function executes

0.1.0.name: rubberduck
0.1.0.description: Punch JavaScript objects and receive events before and after a function executes

0.2.0.name: rubberduck
0.2.0.description: Punch JavaScript objects and receive events before and after a function executes

scripts.add-dist: npm run browserify && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run add-dist && npm version prerelease && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
